subject: Olympic Games (2024)
Polls and Public Opinion
lead_paragraph: Only 36 percent of adults in the Boston region support hosting the Games, while 52 percent oppose doing so, according to the latest poll for WBUR, Boston’s NPR radio station.
snippet: Only 36 percent of adults in the Boston region support hosting the Games, while 52 percent oppose doing so, according to the latest poll for WBUR, Boston’s NPR radio station.
